translation:
Friend and Lord Jaguarão Chico, November 17, 1838

As Dionísio Amaro is proceeding to this place, I beg you to send me the documents pertaining to the matter my brother has gone there to deal with Your Grace.

Being finally that if I obtain what I so desire, it will only increase the gratitude of

Your sincerely obliged friend Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu

To citizen Domingos José de Almeida. Piratini.
